page.title: 12Our area of Ipswich
page.content:
Our family has always lived in Ipswich. We are close to the town with parks and shops as well as a Sports Centre. We cannot think of any disadvantages of living here, because we have all we need. My mum says she would like to see a playgroup for young children. We only have a sports centre close by at Maidenhall but it would be nice for the school to open up in the evenings for indoor sports. Belstead is a nice place with lots to do. There are schools close by with a clinic, library and also ladies and gents hairdressers. We have a good bus service. There are two large hotels in the area for people passing through. We are also close to the A12.
Jonathan Hawley, age 10. Sprites Junior
